remarks: Since the converse holds by ~ a1i , this inference shows that we can represent a not-free hypothesis with either ` F/ x ph ` (inference form) or ` ( ph -> F/ x ph ) ` (deduction form).  (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2018.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 10-Jul-2019.)
statement:
nfdi.1 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x ph ) $.
nfdi $p |- F/ x ph $.
